dict.string: We need access to your photo library to allow you to select images for your profile or to share content. This permission may also be required by third-party libraries used in the app.
We need access to your microphone to enable voice input features in the app. This permission may also be required by third-party libraries used in the app.
We need access to your camera to allow you to take photos or videos within the app. This permission may also be required by third-party libraries used in the app.
We need access to speech recognition to enable voice-to-text features in the app. This permission may also be required by third-party libraries used in the app.
We need access to your location to provide location-based services, such as finding nearby stores or services. This permission may also be required by third-party libraries used in the app.
We need access to your location to provide location-based services while you are using the app. This permission may also be required by third-party libraries used in the app.
